Name Rascal/Statements/Insert

Syntax insert Exp;
Description An insert statement may only occur in the action part of a PatternWithAction, more precisely in
  • A case in a Visit expression. The value matched by the pattern of this case is eplaced by the value of Exp.
  • An action of a rewrite Rule. The value matched by the pattern of the rewrite rule is replaced by the value of Exp.
The following rule applies:
  • The static type of Exp should be a subtype of the type of the value that is replaced.
[Edit] | [New] | [Compile Course] | [Warnings]
